title.rendered: Tourism for Future – Grant Award List

content.rendered:
We are pleased to announce the publication of the grant award list for Call: “TOURISM FOR FUTURE “ECO-LABEL CERTIFICATION –SUSTAINABLE TOURSIM. This list represents the culmination of a rigorous selection process and the commitment of our organization to support projects that align with our mission and goals.

 

We encourage you to review the list to see the diverse entities that have been awarded funding. We extend our heartfelt congratulations to all the recipients of the grants. 

 

If you have any questions or require further information about the grant award list or the grant program, please do not hesitate to contact us at [eli@prishtina-rea.net].

Thank you once again to all applicants for your interest and efforts in applying for the grant. 

 

Please see below the grant award list:
